wizard.title: Add Server to Registry
wizard.cancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel? Your progress will be lost.
wizard.waitForOperation: Please wait for the current operation to complete.
wizard.successDescription: Server has been successfully added to the registry.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: Claim this server or add to community

description.ownership: Let's start by determining your relationship with this server.
description.unclaimed: Add a server to help the community discover it. The owner can claim it later.
description.claimed: As the owner, you can publish this server directly to the registry.

success.unclaimed: Server added to the community registry. The owner can claim it later.
success.claimed: Server published to the registry successfully!

inputStep.title: GitHub Repository
inputStep.label: Repository URL
inputStep.supportedFormats: Supports formats: https://github.com/owner/repo, git@github.com:owner/repo, or owner/repo

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL
errors.notFound: Repository not found. Please check the URL and try again.
errors.rateLimited: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.accessDenied: Failed to access repository. It might be private or the URL is incorrect.

repository.alreadyInRegistry: This repository is already in the registry!

step.title: Server Ownership
step.description: Choose how you want to add this server to the registry.
step.alreadyExists: This server is already in the registry!
step.updateExisting: If you're the owner, you can update the existing server instead of creating a duplicate.
step.canClaim: You can claim this community server if you're the repository owner.

claim.title: Claim this server
claim.description: Verify ownership and unlock premium features
claim.alreadyClaimedDesc: This server has already been claimed by its owner
claim.verificationFailed: You do not have admin access to this repository. Please select "Add to community" instead.
claim.authRequired: GitHub authentication is required to claim servers

community.title: Add to community
community.alreadyInRegistryDesc: This server is already in the registry

benefits.canBeClaimed: Can be claimed later by the owner

actions.title: What can you do?
ifOwnerClaimed: If you own this repository, update the existing server instead
Import the existing server from the registry to your profile
Contact the current owner if you believe there's an issue
ifOwnerUnclaimed: If you own this repository, you can claim the existing community server
Import the existing server from the registry to your profile
Update the community server if you have improvements

ownership.question: Do you own this server?
ownership.owned.description: I'm the repository owner and want to publish it to the registry
ownership.notOwned: No, I'm adding it for the community
ownership.notOwned.description: I found this server and want to help others discover it

envConfig.title: Environment Variables
envConfig.description: Configure environment variables required by this server. These can be customized by users when they install the server.
envConfig.info: Double-click any variable to edit its details. These variables will be stored as metadata in the registry.

variable.name: VARIABLE_NAME
variable.githubToken: GitHub personal access token for API access
variable.noVarsDetected: No environment variables detected. You can add them manually if needed.

discovery.title: Test Server Discovery
discovery.description: Let's test the server to discover its capabilities and ensure it's working correctly.
discovery.notStarted: Click the button below to test the server discovery.

submit.title: Submit to Registry
submit.description: Review your server configuration and submit it to the registry.

placeholders.description: Brief description of what this server does

success.title: Success!
success.claimed: Your server has been successfully published to the registry!
success.community: Server has been added to the community registry. The owner can claim it later.

form.description.placeholder: Brief description of what this server does

success.claimed: Your server has been published to the registry!
success.unclaimed: Server added! The owner can claim it when they're ready.

dialog.title: Claim Server
dialog.description: Verify your ownership to claim this server

claim.pending: Your claim request has been submitted for review

errors.notOwner: You must be the owner of this repository
errors.alreadyExists: This server is already in the registry
errors.publishFailed: Failed to publish server to registry
